title: Track Output
description:
Plugin responsible to configure a track's output.
As any plugin it can be defined as an object with a "type" property that identifies the output to be used. Check the documentation for that property for details about what output types are supported.

channel.title: Output Channel
channel.description: Optional MIDI channel to be used for this track output. If the channel number is set, it marks a mapping of all outgoing MIDI messages such that all are transformed to have that channel number. If it's not set or it's null, message pass without modification.

allOf.title: Output MIDI Device ID
allOf.description: Unique identifier of the associated MIDI output device.

trackId.title: Output Track ID
trackId.description: Identifier of the track that this output is connected to.

type.title: Track Output Type
type.description:
Name that serves as a unique identifier of a Track Output Type. The following values are allowed:
- "device": allows configuring a MIDI device as a track output.
"track": allows configuring this track's output as the input of another track.
